name: create-ponder-app
description: Tool to bootstrap a Ponder project
author: olias.eth

scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run compile && mv dist/bin/create-ponder-app.js dist/bin/create-ponder-app
scripts.release: pnpm run build && VERSION=$(npm version patch) && npm publish && git add ./package.json && git commit -m "release: $VERSION"
